casebody.data:
MIDSOUTH GOLF
v.
FAIRFIELD CONDO ASSO. No. 589P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 20, 2007. Gary S. Parsons, Gavin B. Parsons, Raleigh, Craig D. Justus, Asheville, for Fairfield Harbourside, et al.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 652 S.E.2d 378.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of December 2007 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of December 2007."
